PRIVACY POLICY

This Privacy Policy is provided for informational purposes and does not constitute legal advice. For legal guidance, consult a qualified attorney.

Summary

This policy explains what information Lucira ("we", "our", or "us") collects when you visit or use our website and services, how we use it, and the choices you have. It does not cover third-party sites or services linked from our site.

Changes to This Policy

We may update this policy periodically. We will post the revised policy with an updated "Last updated" date. Material changes may be communicated more prominently.

Personal Data

We do not collect, store, process, or share any personal data about visitors.

Server Logs

Our hosting provider is configured not to store identifiable IP addresses or other personal data in server logs. If any logging occurs, IP addresses are irreversibly anonymized before storage.

Cookies & Tracking

This website sets no cookies and uses no tracking technologies.

Third-Party Services

This website does not use any third-party analytics, fonts, CDNs, embeds, or plugins that process user data.

Contact

If you have questions or requests about this policy, contact us at contact@lucirastrategy.com
